titles.title: To require the Secretary of Agriculture to grant an easement to Chugach Alaska Corporation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 105-782.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 443.

bill.summary: 10/6/1998--Reported to House amended. Directs the Secretary of Agriculture, not later than December 11, 1998, to grant Chugach Alaska Corporation a 500-foot-wide easement for the construction, use, and maintenance of nonpublic roads and related facilities necessary for access to and economic development of the land interests in the Carbon Mountain and Katalla vicinity conveyed to the Corporation under the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act. Directs the Corporation, after completing such construction, to submit to the Secretary a survey of such roads and facilities and to relinquish such portions of the easement not necessary for future use.
